name: Flier Match
short_description:
A FPS Multiplayer 3D Game.
 - Multithread Game Server
 - OpenGL and Software Rendering
 - Maps and spaceships can be easily added to increase game diversity
 - 3D Sound and capacity of customize the songs to play while gaming
